title: Calculate ATC from labor inputs table

content.question: The table above shows the amount of labor inputs necessary to produce given levels of output. If the cost of a unit of labor is $20 and total fixed cost is $100, the average total cost of producing 20 units of output is

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
